Compete with players worldwide to achieve the fastest completion times and secure your place at the top of the global leaderboards. As players race against the clock, they also get to explore iconic moments, notable figures, and landmarks from American history, making the game both thrilling and educational.

description: Become the God of Harvest, explore the world of food and adventure, plant, trade, and spread deliciousness to create your own path to prosperity!

name: Malleus Cocconum: The Heiress
description: You were Arenda Finch, a fifteen-year-old girl who had inherited a vast fortune. Expelled from your old school, you were transferred to a new school located within Dunkenwood House. The dark side of elitism awaited. Humanity or demonic nature? Love or desire? Your choices would determine her fate.

name: Warranty Not Included
description: Warranty Not Included is a fun and accessible VR shooter perfect for newcomers. Practice your aim in various ranges and blast away at hordes of robotic enemies. Join the Resistance Now!

name: Phantom's Estate
description: Phantom's Estate is a Survival Horror game where you have the choice of going in solo, or gathering your friends to hunt for the dead. Be aware though as these ghosts have been reported to track and learn your mistakes while you explore...

name: Suikoden I HD Remaster: Gate Rune War
description: Remaster of the first Suikoden game, released as part of the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars bundle.

name: Suikoden II HD Remaster: Dunan Unification War
description: Remaster of the second Suikoden game, released as part of the Suikoden I & II HD Remaster: Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars bundle.

name: Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete
description: Remaster of the complete version of Lunar: Silver Star Story, released as part of the Lunar Remastered Collection bundle.

name: Hope's Farm 2
description: Build your dream farm in this unique blend of farming and puzzle adventure! Grow crops, raise adorable animals, and solve delightful puzzles to unlock new items and expand your farmland.

name: Tentacle Tango
description: Tentacle Tango is a quirky co-op puzzle-platformer where you and a partner must work together, tethered by a flexible tentacle. Don’t let the cute visuals fool you—this game is as challenging as it is charming. Every jump, swing, and tentacle bend requires precise coordination as you navigate puzzles, obstacles, and enemies. Whether playing solo or in local co-op, teamwork is your only path to victory, because after all, it takes two to tango!

name: So Many Zombies
description: So Many Zombies! is a fast-paced top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements that pits you against relentless waves of the undead. Face heart-pounding action and test your skills in a chaotic, bullet-filled battlefield where every second counts. How long can you last against the swarm?

name: Culinary Tour
description:
The Forgotten Culinary World, Rediscovered and Continued by You!

The food of various countries is personified as a anime, helping you in the whole process! Your favorite food will transform into a unique culinary elf, accompanying you through various difficulties and obstacles in a different world, so that you are no longer lonely.

With just one click, the Food Elf can easily sweep away evil monsters for you; One click harvest allows you to quickly obtain the resources you need! Let's talk together online and save another world, while offline, we'll lay flat and reap abundant rewards.

In addition to maintaining peace in other worlds, it can also cultivate the favorability of food elves and add combat power to you! Which type of food spirit do you like?

One handed operation, easy and casual~Hidden battles, automatic level clearing, multi line advancement saves more time! Diverse gameplay, experience different worlds.

name: Terminal Control 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fly
description:
Fly is game for the Meta Quest and Apple Vision pro headsets that uses Google Earth data to let the user explore the world.

Embark on an extraordinary journey with FLY, and redefine the way you explore our planet. Powered by Google's cutting-edge 3D Maps Tiles, this immersive experience lets you soar through the skies and witness the world's wonders like never before. From the ground all the way to the edge of space, you can truly Fly for the first time.

name: Perplex
description: A neon-themed 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate intricate levels, solve physics-based challenges, and avoid obstacles to reach the portal. Play solo or with a friend in a visually stunning retro-futuristic world that tests your precision and strategic thinking.

name: Metroid PrimeHack
description:
PrimeHack is a specialised build of Dolphin authored by Shiiion that introduces traditional first person shooter aiming and controls to the Metroid Prime games, with the goal of making the game play and feel like a native PC game.

PrimeHack is not just a mod of Dolphin, at runtime PrimeHack will modify game code and objects in memory to take direct control of the game.

name: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki's Chronicle
description: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki's Chronicle is an adventure game where you can experience summer vacation in the world of “Natsume's Book of Friends”. As the protagonist Takashi Natsume, you are able to meet other friends and spirits and enjoy a wonderful summertime.

name: Mordbrann
description: Sin descripción

name: Tulips & Windmills
description: Hoi! Ensure your windmill runs consistently and your tulip fields are harvested. This clicker game will bring you closer to the iconic Dutch culture. Expect random events and make use of upgrades to increase your tulip wealth! Veel succes!

name: Shadows Of Wyrmwood
description: Shadows of Wyrmwood is a roguelike adventure RPG. Use spells, swords, and strategy to defeat every corrupted foe. Travel across four procedurally generated maps that grow harder with every encounter. With each victory, you obtain new armor, weapons, and spells from defeated enemies.

name: Lil Gator Game: In the Dark
description:
In this charming DLC you’ll find that new adventures and friends are just beneath the surface—literally! Get ready to “cave in” to the fun and find that you’re stalag-right where you belong!

This BIG DLC is filled to the brim with all the charm and humour you loved in Lil Gator Game. There is a buddy in every cave and crevasse in this NEW, BIG, UNDERGROUND ADVENTURE!

name: Capri Care
description: Capri Care lets you care for and interact with adorable Capri creatures. Compete in fun minigames, breed new colors and traits, and explore a vibrant island. Feed, train, and bond with your Capri to unlock new adventures and surprises in this magical world!

name: Ambidextro
description: A witch has kidnapped the prince and princess. As a royal wizard, it is your mission to rescue them both at the same time, but first you will have to learn to control your two bodies simultaneously.

name: Julian & Friends
description: Join Julian and his friends in this psychological horror experience inspired by point-n-click computer games from the early 2000s. Witness many shenanigans with characters from the infamous 98xx.

description: 'My Dad is a Hero' is an action RPG adventure where players alternate between two protagonists. The game is structured into three acts, with its core focus on diverse and conceptually unique boss battles.

name: Imaginary Bad Friend
description: A short visual novel game in which a boy named Shiomi suddenly appears one day, and the protagonist, who recognizes him as an imaginary friend, converses with him to find out what happened between them.

name: 1000 Missiles: Defense of Tornwa
description: Missile Defense Game: Protect Your Country The enemy will employ various strategies to breach your defenses. Stay adaptable to survive. Defend Your Nation: Use strategic placement and upgrades of your AA systems to fend off relentless missile attacks and protect your country.

name: 2025: Tobi
description: The second in Kibodo's classic game series. It is a vertical scrolling shooting game! Controls are left and right movement only. The game is over when the fighter runs out of bullets. Get items to replenish bullets and destroy the enemies in front of you! Aim for a high score!

name: 22 Dayz
description: "22 Dayz" is a thrilling survival adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. In a land ravaged by zombies, bandits, and scarcity, you must protect your family by gathering resources and making tough choices.

name: 250ms
description: 『250ms』 is a platform game that tests the player's reaction speed. The name '250ms' refers to the average human reaction time. Players progress through stages by quickly defeating various enemies.

name: 2024: Aliens Are Coming
description: An Indie Sci-Fi Adventure game that thrusts you into the heart of the secrecy surrounding UFOs and Aliens. Visit exotic places, meet Aliens, make alliances and enemies alike as you make critical decisions and fight for what you think is right. Time is short, because it's 2024, and Aliens Are Coming!

name: 201: The Bad Number
description: "201 - The Bad Number" is an interactive science fiction game-book set on a post-apocalyptic Mars. In a world where only 200 people remain, each new inhabitant may hasten civilization's end. Players make choices that impact the fate of humanity and the colony in a unique dystopian setting.
:3 s̶a̶v̶e̶s̶ ̶t̶e̶h̶ ̶w̶o̶r̶l̶d goes from a red place to a blue place in search of a more colorful life, while chasing balls of yarn across switches and potentially dying a lot and solving puzzles.

3072 is a classic puzzle game that combines two identical color block numbers into a new number by moving them up and down, left and right. Your goal is very simple, to reach 3072, come and challenge.

name: 2Synth

name: 3.14 Idle

Dive into a horror game where each map is uniquely generated procedurally. Survive by stealthily navigating through dark environments to escape the creature known as 3199.

Enjoy spectacular surprises, with soothing music and visuals from the calm of a starry night to the rush of heated battles!

name: Alma and the Fragments of Cursed Memories

name: Hungry Meem
description: Meems, the hungry creatures that live under the World Tree, are in danger of extinction! Let's make the Meems' lives happy by exploring around the World Tree with them and developing their settlement!

name: Battle Mayhem

Designed for endless fun and fierce competition, Battle Mayhem pits two players against each other in a thrilling fight to be the last one standing.

name: Frip and Froop's Logical Labyrinth DX
description:
Hang on to your test tubes, because Frip and Froop are back! In this full remake of the Sokoban-type top-down puzzle game, you play as the young boy Froop as he explores his uncle's FripTech Laboratories testing facility and beyond to uncover a mystery while using unique and fun gadgets and tools!

In this remake of the Sokoban-type top-down puzzle game, you play as the young boy Froop as he explores his uncle's FripTech Laboratories testing facility and beyond to uncover a mystery while using unique and fun gadgets and tools!

name: Lords of the Void
description: Lords of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy world on the brink of extinction, shattered by a devastating magical Calamity. Lead your people to victory through tough battles, uncovering unique stories behind each faction.

name: Tenshi
description: Don't Blink. They're Always Watching. Enter the haunting corridors of the Fukushima asylum, a short but intense bodycam-style horror game that will leave you breathless.

name: Samurai Brothers
description: Samurai Brothers is a fast paced shared-screen multiplayer game. In addition to the solo mode, two modes are available for multiplayer games. Do you want to fight against your friends ? Or work as a team against the multitude of enemies ?

name: Silent Signals
description: Hack the System. Uncover the Truth

name: Well Dumb
description: It's a simple swiping game. You catch fish from a well. Trade fish with other players. Regular updates and fish drop events! Happy Fishing!

name: Up Island
description: The tides are rising and starts to flood your island. The only way to escape, is to find your boat at the top of the island and sail away. You must hurry before the flood takes you away.

name: Ninth Hotel
description: You are trapped in a Hotel by accident Find out all the signs of abnormality in the hallway Escape by going down to the first floor while carefully observing your surroundings

name: Jailbreak Assault
description: In Jailbreak Assault, you're a prisoner on a daring mission to break free. Start with a key and a baton, outwit guards, destroy documents, and disable security systems. Arm yourself for the ultimate challenge: escaping the heavily fortified perimeter.

name: Call The Abyss
description: 2D Survival Arcade Game packed with Action and Dark Magic. You cannot survive the relentless Forces of Good alone. Better call allies from the Abyss!! Gather Resources and Summon them from your Cauldron. Conquer the worldwide Leaderboard. Completely FREE TO PLAY!! For now...

name: Prison Notes
description: Prison Notes is a RPG with text-based ADV and cultivation elements. You act as a young migrant worker, wrongly imprisoned in the prison known as "The Coral Reef".What challenges and adventures are awaiting? Will you finally find a way out? Your choices and actions will decide the end of your story.

name: YieldTrillions
description: Hello, I'm a corn alien, I need to start the ship and go home, please V I have 10000000000 pounds of corn for spaceship fuel and I'll give you half a pound of popcorn as a reward when I get home.

name: Terminal One
description: Airport building and light business tycoon game. Build up an airport providing cargo, maintenance, and passenger service. Choose which upgrades to invest in, manage policies, organize finances, optimize layouts, and balance carbon emissions.

name: A Pizza Delivery
description: A Pizza Delivery is a narrative exploration game with puzzle elements focused on connecting with people. Share pizza with charming characters to uncover their stories—and your own. Drive and explore a strange, meditative world filled with secrets.

name: Enerdusk
description: "Enerdusk" is a roguelike deck-building game where you develop strategies centered on units while utilizing cards. Decks and items empower your units, and in turn, your units enhance your deck and shift the battle in your favor. Master this synergy to dominate all your enemies.

name: Aisera's Ladder
description: Come and experience the fast and exciting cold weapon battles! Understand the vast world of Azeroth in battle; By using exquisite combat skills to defeat the weak, managing a farm to produce food, and running a tavern to accumulate gold coins and upgrade equipment.

name: Whispers in the Wood
description: Whispers in the Forest is a single-player base defense strategy game where you must build, upgrade, and defend your base against demonic creatures in a cursed forest. Manage your resources, lead your troops, and survive the darkness of the night as you fight to protect your only hope for salvation.

name: Whack Mole
description: The player gets ready to face moles popping up from various holes. As the game advances, the speed and frequency of the moles' appearances increase, challenging the player's reflexes and hand-eye coordination.

name: Bear Jump
description: Step into the bouncy world of Bear Jump! Help a determined bear jump endlessly upward, dodging obstacles, collecting power-ups, and reaching new heights. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Bear Jump is easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: Slice Adventure
description: Grab the blade and slice through hordes of enemies in this new "bullet hell" game - Slice Adventure! Control a powerful cursor-sword with simple mouse-only controls. Survive endless waves, check your reflexes, and create unique playstyles using various weapons and items combinations.

name: Threat Vector
description: Battle across the solar system as annihilation looms over mankind in this action sci-fi horror FPS. Powered by id Tech, THREAT VECTOR delivers classic FPS combat throughout a suite of concise, potent levels infested with deadly horrors… and loaded with enough firepower to destroy them all.

name: Undertale: Repent to Jesus
description: Christian mod with bible verses. Tells the true meaning of Christmas. Converts the game into a God-honoring adventure with the gospel. Revamps some of the story. Changes some sprites. Has two main endings - requires a second playthrough for the second ending (has sort of secret...? requirements to unlock). Most graphical changes are in the second playthrough. Interaction with objects and NPCS instead of rushing through the game is recommended.

name: Monmusu Girls: Autobattler
description: This is a strategic and adventurous idle auto-battler where you'll collect a variety of monmusu girls, form your adventuring team, and challenge the Demon King! Each girl comes with unique skills and bonds, and mastering the right combinations is the key to victory. Embark on a magical journey!

name: Miku Legends 2
description: Get ready to dive into the world of Mega Man Legends 2 like never before! In this special mod, the iconic blue hero has been swapped out for the Vocaloid superstar herself—Hatsune Miku! Grab your buster (or should we say, Miku-themed buster?), and explore this fan-favorite adventure in full Miku style. This isn’t just a character swap—it’s a full Miku transformation!

name: Word Whammer
description: Jam on word-building skills in 3 action-packed games that adjust to your child's skill level.

name: Scarlet Girls
description:
Commander, the girls await your call. Are you ready for this epic journey?

In the 119th year of the Old Euro Calendar, a mysterious catastrophe gave rise to crazed "Catastromechs" that swept through civilization. Survivors created new shelters and fused Catastromech cores with humans, creating powerful "Stellar Spirit" battle maidens. As Commander, lead these battle maidens to combat the Catastromechs, rebuild a new home called "Pax," and restore peace.

name: Adhvan Chakra
description: Command divine aerial forces in a real-time tactical combat experience set in a dharmic fantasy world. Strategize, adapt, and upgrade to defend vast territories from devastating invasions. Uncover ancient artifacts, perform sacred rituals, and unravel the mystery of the Adhvan Chakra.

name: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis: AMEN
description: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis (AMEN) is a hidden object game. The player's task is to find things hidden on the map. Help Alice cross this path, destroy the ego-structure, get out of the abyss, find the key.

name: The Heist in LS
description:
"The Heist in LS" is a fun and quirky puzzle exploration game that continues the story of our protagonist from Loading Studios previous game, "Waking Up in LS". This time, she's tasked by two journalists with a new mission: to break into Cristiano Ronaldo's mansion and steal the secret recipe for his famous Travesseiros cakes.

As you explore the mansion, you'll encounter various obstacles and challenges that will test your puzzle-solving skills. You'll need to use your wit and cunning to outsmart Ronaldo's security measures and collect helpful items along the way.

But it's not all serious business! "The Heist in LS" is full of hilarious moments and tongue-in-cheek references that are sure to make you laugh out loud. From hidden Easter eggs to unexpected plot twists, this game is packed with surprises and delights at every turn.

Whether you're a fan of puzzle games, exploration games, or just love a good laugh, this is the perfect game for you. With its engaging gameplay, charming pixel art graphics, and irreverent sense of humor, this game is sure to leave you smiling and wanting more.

So what are you waiting for? Put on your best heist outfit, grab your bag of tricks, and get ready for the adventure of a lifetime in "The Heist in LS"!

name: Lost in LS
description:
"Lost in LS" is a narrative and exploration game that marks the thrilling finale of a wacky and irreverent trilogy. As the mother of the protagonist from the previous games "Waking Up in LS" and "The Heist in LS", you embark on a mission to find your missing daughter. When you go to the police station to report her disappearance, they dismiss your claims. Determined to find her, you take matters into your own hands, searching for clues and following leads that take you to unexpected places.

Don't expect a typical rescue mission - Explore LS and interact with its eccentric locals to gather information, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth. But remember, danger lurks around every corner, from the sewers to Ronaldo's mansion, and you must stay one step ahead to save your daughter.

With immersive gameplay, pixel art graphics, and a captivating storyline, this adventure will keep you on the edge of your seat. Will you be able to bring your daughter back home and expose the truth behind the kidnapper? Play now to find out!

name: Aegis Force: The Scorian War
description: Aegis Force is a single player, story-driven, strategy RPG (SRPG) that has an engaging grid-based tactical combat system. It is designed in a breathtaking 2.5d pixel art style. Players can recruit for and customize their party, using gameplay that includes full world and town exploration.

name: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass
description: Scary Shadow Spot: Bitter Glass. Without memory, John Doe wanders the desert until he finds refuge in a haunted saloon. The ghosts of the past demand justice, and every clue brings him closer to an unsettling truth. Are you ready to uncover the secret of the Bitter Glass?

name: Sincere Deceit
description:
Sincere Deceit is a fangame based on the indie title OFF by Mortis Ghost. You play as The Batter once more, dropped into a world slowly falling apart from a mysterious force corrupting it. It is your job to decide whether to fight against this force, or let it consume the world around you. Follow either of the two voices guiding you, or choose to cut your own path to find out the truth of what happened.

Sincere Deceit is a horror game at heart, and thus deals with many heavy topics, such as violence/cruelty, gore/body horror, suicide, cult indoctrination, jumpscares (both visual and audio based) and some flashing on the screen. This is not a game for the faint of heart.

name: Haven & Hearth
description:
Haven & Hearth comes to Steam with the release of World 16.

Haven & Hearth is a MMORPG (Massive Multiplayer Online Roleplaying Game) set in a fictional world loosely inspired by Slavic and Germanic myth and legend. The game sets itself apart from other games in the genre in its aim to provide players with an interactive, affectable and mutable game world, which can be permanently and fundamentally changed and affected through actions undertaken by the players. Our fundamental goal with Haven & Hearth is to create a game in which player choices have permanent and/or lasting effects and, thus, providing said players with a meaningful and fun gaming experience.

name: Jump Truck
description: Hop over gaps, flip between rooftops and launch yourself through an entire planet to become the fastest truck in the universe. Jump Truck is a 3D racing game about finding shortcuts and executing crazy aerials.

name: Ignisia
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey, explore the vast expanses of Ignisia, where magic, adventure, and powerful enemies await you. Discover an amazing world, uncover ancient secrets, and unite with friends to protect it from the looming threat. Perhaps in the future, you’ll find discoveries you never even imagined…

name: It's On The Mouse
description: Become the best tiny maid on the block! Help Holly and her friends in this little café manager where jumping and running are key to make up for your lack of size! Scuttle around the tables, serve your customers and be careful as dangerous obstacles and bosses will show up to try to stop you!

name: Frozen Inferno
description: Nana has come to face her sins, but it seems things would not go her way... Frozen Inferno is an Ice Climber fan-game that takes horror elements and mix them with platforming gameplay to give you a short but fun experience.

name: Moo & Move: Extra Grazing Grounds
description: Guide the hungry cow to its goal. Place directional tiles on the ground and to solve the puzzles. Watch as the cow follows the path to reach its tasty hay.

name: Night Shift: Laundry
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Buck Hunter Pro Adventure
description: Big Buck Hunter Pro Adventure features Adventure Mode where players embark on their own custom hunting vacation across 18 different locations across North America.

name: Disney The Little Mermaid: Undersea Treasures!
description: Discover lost items from the mysterious human world above the waves and reveal unique hidden treasures. From the site of an old shipwreck to Ariel's secret grotto, King Triton's throne room to the incredible coral canyons. Find items quickly in each scene to earn bonus points and claim your place on the leaderboard.

name: Magic Book Auto Battler
description: Magicbook AutoBattler is a non-traditional strategy game that combines Roguelite moves. This game has unique binding combinations, rich weapons and equipment, cool magical effects, and thrilling combat scenes. In the world of magic books, you will face endless challenges and rewards……

name: PicoMix By NuSan
description:
PicoMix by NuSan features games made by creator NuSan over a 8 years period of time. It’s a compilation of works in multiple genres, like platform, puzzle, crafting, or base building for a total of about 20 fun games and experiments, some will provide hours of interesting challenges while others can be completed in a few minutes.

All of the games were made using “fantasy console” Pico 8 with its recognizable 16-color palette, crunchy sweet 128x128 resolution pixel art and 4-channel chiptune

Thanks to the use of Zepto 8 emulator, an optional wide mode is included in some of the games to go beyond Pico 8’s usual square screen, as well as visual filters to tweak your experience (scanlines, CRT, toon, minit...)

name: Cube Crawler
description: Take on the challenge and discover a completely new 3D sci-fi dungeon crawler. The sophisticated room card mechanics and endless generated dungeons with the form of a cube, this game is unique in this genre. What will you discover while exploring?

name: My Chemical Romance: Sweet Revenge!!!
description: One of two flash games created for mychemicalromance.com to promote their second album, "Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge". The game follows a Saint tasked with resurrecting the Demolition Lovers (the protagonists of the first two MCR albums). The first three levels involve flying around collecting keys and avoiding ghosts bouncing around the screen. The Demo Man is then taken through the hospital catacombs where the Saint must fly through barriers and avoid fire. Upon exiting the catacombs, the Saint is tasked with collecting electricity for the defibrillator paddles to revive the Demo Man. Similar to the first three levels, the Saint flies around the room collecting bolts of electricity while avoiding viruses. Once resurrected, the Demo Man tells the Saint to go back to get his wife. The player repeats the actions of taken to save the Demo Man, this time with an increased amount of ghosts as well as the gunman from the introduction of the game. After venturing through the catacombs and avoiding the last batch of enemies to collect enough power to resurrect the Demo Woman, the Demolition Lovers finally have Revenge. This game is also still playable on Albino Blacksheep.

name: My Chemical Romance: Helena
description: One of two flash games created for mychemicalromance.com to promote their second album, "Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge". Modeled after the single "Helena", the game consisted of four levels, the first three of which are top-down shooters. The goal of these levels is to defeat the enemies in red and activate the four pall bearers. Each level has the same layout with an increasing number of enemies and alternating color scheme. The fourth and final level of the game involves a hearse chase and shootout while avoiding obstacles on the road. While the game has been removed from the official website, it can still be played on Albino Blacksheep.

name: For Sale
description: For Sale is a PSX-esque first-person horror adventure game with a strong emphasis on atmosphere and exploration. Interact with objects, take pictures using your digital camera, and discover unnerving secrets all while exploring a seemingly ordinary house.

name: Cedric & Odious
description: Battle through a dark fantasy world as a resurrected warrior king. Once loyal friends, you now serve at the mercy of Odious, a brilliant but corrupt sorcerer. Master tactical combat and magical artifacts in this challenging action RPG.

name: All Will Fall
description: A post-apocalyptic city builder where every structure can collapse. Master a unique physics-based 3D construction system, create a sprawling vertical settlement on water, scavenge for resources, explore the ocean, and ensure your colony's survival by making difficult yet necessary decisions.

name: Monitoring All Night
description: "Monitoring All Night" is a horror-style game in which you report anomalies while performing monitoring duties. Report anomalies appropriately and survive until the end of your shift. And watch out for the aliens.

name: Code Violet
description:
Developed by TeamKill Media, Code Violet is a third-person action horror game, where you take on the role of Violet Sinclair, a girl plucked from the past who must unravel the mysteries of the Aion Bioengineering Complex as she avoids, hides or fights against the creatures who have overrun it.

With the evacuation protocol in effect, Violet’s main goal is to escape the complex and save those she cares for, but with the creatures and a mysterious Director doing all in their power to stop you, will you get out alive?

name: Dragon Ruins II
description: An indie dungeon crawler inspired by late 80s and early 90s CRPGs.

name: Transcontinental

Multiplayer in local wifi or online
Dedicated VR-only servers
Intuitive Weapons Selection
Fully Tracked Weapons
features additional mappacks via companion app
4 maps inlcuded, you can jump into action right away.
Unique Quest Home enviroment included (by Robyer1)
Use the Companion App for streamlined hd mod and mappack installation. The app is in "unknown sources". Use it to change your player name as well.

description:
The vampire Desmond woke up from his long sleep and attacked the villagers of Burnsley.

A knight sent by the realm, will go to the vampire's dwelling to settle this matter.

From room to room, he will have to face the enemies and take the different secret passages of the castle to be able to face the terrible Desmond!

Hunting Grounds - Whispers Of The Woods is a free game aiming at letting people know about our transmedia IP named Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit (which will include video games, but also board games).

In this game, you have 20 minutes to find magical artifacts to give to the shaman Crazy Owl before the end of the night, so that he can perform a ceremony to get rid of the creature that haunts this dreamlike Native American universe at night.

developers.name: Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit

name: Heart Electric
description:
Heart Electric is a 4-team multiplayer Arena/Hero Shooter video game in active development by Modoyo Studio. The game features a new, resource-stealing game mode, free magnetic movement and unique heroes with abilities and personalities.
Modoyo is hosting frequent playtests for Heart Electric.

description:
Oath of the Necromancer is a rogue-like & bullet-heaven mix; survive by raising hordes of skeletons to fight alongside you against the many foes of ancient Egypt and Greece.

In the name of Serapis, the ancient Graeco-Egyptian God of life and death, you rebuild a lost religion, raise legendary heroes, find mighty relics, and raise powerful armies of the dead.

name: Kaodi
description: Kaodi is a brief, narrative-driven 2D platformer experience where you control Barren on his journey back home after playing a key role in the victory over the Republic of Shan. Explore a kingdom fractured by war and discover the scars it has left on its people.

name: Great Journey
description:
Do you like adventures? Would you like to travel the world?

Then don't waste any more time and join Tony and Annie on their mission to save Antarctica, home of their dear friends!

Immerse in a thrilling adventure and visit lots of vibrant sceneries - from small port towns, through hot, sandy deserts and damp, colorful jungle, all the way to the land of snow and ice.

Based on a mainstream technology from our previous game - Grom, making use of enchanting, prerendered backgrounds and smoothly animated, real-time 3D characters, the game looks and feels different than other titles from this genre available on the market today.

name: From The Other Side

Don the fabled white and red solo or with up to 3 friends as you dash your way through this fast-paced holiday frenzy!

name: Decade
description: Explore an alternate past. Discover how its ideas develop, distort, and disappear. Seed new movements, destroy others. Subvert the rise and fall of empires, art, ideologies, and individuals in this narrative adventure game.

name: Soporfall

A collection of five interactive narratives exploring a variety of dreamscapes which, interwoven, tell the story of a shattering dreamer.

Befriend fallen angels, spelunk impossible ruins, find love amidst regal bugs, get in poetry battles with forest critters or delve into a pastry-making bureaucracy. Soporfall valley is yours!

Unlock the Secret Hub to play as a SPINOSAURUS and T-REX!

A Mod Of The Somewhat Popular Mario VS Luigi Online!

This Mod Aims To Be Serious & Silly, With A Little Somthin' For Casual, & Competitive Players. Hazards, Which Are Random Objects That Randomly Spawn In The Maps.This Mod Features New Maps, Unused VS Maps From The Original Game, & More Unique Maps! New Characters Like Toad, & New Powerups Like The Bubble Flower & Bombro, & Several "Joke" Powerups. And Some Features To Customise Matches Further.

A bunch of other smaller features to find out yourself :)

name: Who am I?

name: Turning the Page
description:
For Felix and Sophie Page, two professors at Riverside College, things are going very well. They have jobs they love, they are well respected and most importantly: they have each other. In fact, their recent marriage has made it official. Nothing could get between them... except maybe one of their students...

Turning the Page is a Visual Novel focused on Netorare and Corruption.

In particular, it is part of the “mystery NTR” subgenre, meaning that the player can choose to experience the story through either the hero’s point of view, with an obscured and limited view of what is happening, or from the heroine’s perspective which shows her being stolen away from the hero in complete detail.

name: Super Smash Bros. Brawl
description:
Super Smash Bros. Brawl is an Adobe Flash game published by Extra Toxic as part of its Nintendo advent calendar microsite. The game was made to promote the game of the same name.

Once the player starts the game, the player will have to alternate between clicking on one of their swords to send a beam into the opposing character (when that character is not using a shield on that spot), and holding up their own shield to deflect the other character's sword. While the character that the player is facing will change after either character hits the other, the player is always playing as Mario. The game ends when either the player or the computer-controlled character hits their opponent five times. If the player wins, the game will save the amount of time it took for them to finish the game as the player's record.

Koneko no Daibouken: Chibi-chan ga Iku received an unlicensed port for the Sega Master System in South Korea, being available only to certain multicarts. The bootleg game Super Penguin, which is a ROM hack of this game, was sold for the Master System as well, albeit in standalone format.

name: Tayutama: Kiss on my Deity
description:
The visual novel Tayutama: Kiss on my Deity makes its return with a remastered edition, launching on Nintendo Switch and Steam in spring 2025 with a simultaneous worldwide release.

First released for PC in July 2008, the game quickly captured fans’ hearts, inspiring an anime adaptation in 2009.

This updated edition, supervised by Lump of Sugar, has been reimagined as an all-ages experience, partially remastered in high-definition, and localized into multiple languages.

The story follows protagonist Yuri Mito, the only son of the local priest at Yachimata Shrine. After a series of events during spring break, Yuri meets Kikuramikami no Hime, the guardian of a mystical relic in the woods near his school. She explains the strained history between humans and the Tayutai, a mythical race sealed within the relic due to their potential threat to humanity. To bridge the gap between their worlds, the goddess reincarnates as a young girl named Mashiro and entrusts herself to Yuri. However, the relic is accidentally destroyed, releasing the Tayutai. Particularly dangerous are the “Three Mightiest,” powerful entities hostile toward humans.

Armed with spirit powers unique to his lineage, Yuri teams up with Mashiro and three other heroines to explore whether humans and Tayutai can coexist peacefully. This romantic fantasy adventure tells a heartfelt tale of growth, connection, and the mysteries of love.
